com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class ReshapeHandlerHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.ReshapeHandlerHandle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDragHandler, IHandle

    public class ReshapeHandlerHandle
extends Object
implements IHandle
    A more sophisticated IHandle implementation that delegates to a IReshapeHandler.

    This class works on an IReshapeHandler.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReshapeHandlerHandle(HandlePositions position, IReshapeHandler reshapeHandler)

      Subclass constructor that creates a handle for the given position using the location instance as the Location for the handle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReshapeHandlerHandle

        public ReshapeHandlerHandle(HandlePositions position,
                            IReshapeHandler reshapeHandler)
        Subclass constructor that creates a handle for the given position using the location instance as the Location for the handle.

        The instance modifies the instances using the reshapeable interface and reads the current state using the rect. The handle will automatically trim changes of the rectangle to the specified minimum and maximum size.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the handle.
        reshapeHandler - The reshapeable to write the changes to.

      • ReshapeHandlerHandle

        public ReshapeHandlerHandle(HandlePositions position,
                            IReshapeHandler reshapeHandler,
                            ISize minimumSize)
        Subclass constructor that creates a handle for the given position using the location instance as the Location for the handle.

        The instance modifies the instances using the reshapeable interface and reads the current state using the rect. The handle will automatically trim changes of the rectangle to the specified minimum and maximum size.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the handle.
        reshapeHandler - The reshapeable to write the changes to.
        minimumSize - The minimum size allowed for the rectangle.

      • ReshapeHandlerHandle

        public ReshapeHandlerHandle(HandlePositions position,
                            IReshapeHandler reshapeHandler,
                            ISize minimumSize,
                            ISize maximumSize)
        Subclass constructor that creates a handle for the given position using the location instance as the Location for the handle.

        The instance modifies the instances using the reshapeable interface and reads the current state using the rect. The handle will automatically trim changes of the rectangle to the specified minimum and maximum size.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the handle.
        reshapeHandler - The reshapeable to write the changes to.
        maximumSize - The maximum size allowed for the rectangle.
        minimumSize - The minimum size allowed for the rectangle.

    • Method Detail

      • cancelDrag

        public void cancelDrag(IInputModeContext context,
                       PointD originalLocation)
        Delegates the cancel request to the IReshapeHandler.
        Specified by:
        cancelDrag in interface IDragHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve information about the drag from.
        originalLocation - The value of the coordinate of the Location property at the time of IDragHandler.initializeDrag(IInputModeContext).

      • dragFinished

        public void dragFinished(IInputModeContext context,
                         PointD originalLocation,
                         PointD newLocation)
        Delegates the finish request to the IReshapeHandler.
        Specified by:
        dragFinished in interface IDragHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve information about the drag from.
        originalLocation - The value of the Location property at the time of IDragHandler.initializeDrag(IInputModeContext).
        newLocation - The coordinates in the world coordinate system that the client wants the handle to be at. Depending on the implementation the Location may or may not be modified to reflect the new value. This is the same value as delivered in the last invocation of IDragHandler.handleMove(IInputModeContext, PointD, PointD)

      • getCursor

        public final Cursor getCursor()
        Gets the cursor to display when the mouse hovers over or drags this handle.
        Specified by:
        getCursor in interface IHandle
        Returns:
        The Cursor.
        See Also:
        setCursor(Cursor)

      • getLocation

        public final IPoint getLocation()
        Returns a view of the center of the handle.

        The point describes the current world coordinate of the element that can be modified by this handle.

        Specified by:
        getLocation in interface IDragHandler
        Returns:
        The Location.

      • getMaximumSize

        public final ISize getMaximumSize()
        Gets the maximum size allowed for the reshapeable.

        The value is stored by reference. The default is SizeD.INFINITE.

        Returns:
        The MaximumSize.
        See Also:
        setMaximumSize(ISize)

      • getMinimumEnclosedArea

        public final IRectangle getMinimumEnclosedArea()
        Gets the minimum enclosed area that needs to be encompassed by this reshapeable.

        The value is stored by reference. The default is SizeD.ZERO, which does not restrict the area at all.

        Returns:
        The MinimumEnclosedArea.
        See Also:
        setMinimumEnclosedArea(IRectangle)

      • getMinimumSize

        public final ISize getMinimumSize()
        Gets the minimum size allowed for the reshapeable.

        The value is stored by reference. The default is SizeD.ZERO.

        Returns:
        The MinimumSize.
        See Also:
        setMinimumSize(ISize)

      • getReshapeHandler

        protected final IReshapeHandler getReshapeHandler()
        The reshapeable instance to write the changes to.
        Returns:
        The ReshapeHandler.

      • getType

        public final HandleTypes getType()
        Gets the type of the handle that can be used by the rendering engine to render types differently.
        Specified by:
        getType in interface IHandle
        Returns:
        The Type.
        See Also:
        setType(HandleTypes)

      • handleMove

        public void handleMove(IInputModeContext context,
                       PointD originalLocation,
                       PointD newLocation)
        Delegates the move request to the IReshapeHandler.handleReshape(IInputModeContext, RectD, RectD) method.
        Specified by:
        handleMove in interface IDragHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve information about the drag from.
        originalLocation - The value of the Location property at the time of IDragHandler.initializeDrag(IInputModeContext).
        newLocation - The coordinates in the world coordinate system that the client wants the handle to be at. Depending on the implementation the Location may or may not be modified to reflect the new value.

      • initializeDrag

        public void initializeDrag(IInputModeContext context)
        This implementation does nothing.
        Specified by:
        initializeDrag in interface IDragHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve information about the drag from.
